item.title: Rapid7
item.description: Specialist account executive overlay to run the Threat Intelligence business for Australia and New Zealand, following the acquisition of Intsights by Rapid7.

item.description: Supported the Australian, New Zealand and Asia-Pacific region sales teams.

item.title: Symantec
item.description: Worked with focus partners, global integrators and distributors to ensure they had the technical pre-sales knowledge required to position, sell, scope and design Symantec solutions for on-premises, pure cloud and hybrid deployments.
item.dc:creator: Richard Stocks

item.title: Websense
item.description: Worked with focus partners, global integrators and distributors to ensure they had the technical pre-sales knowledge required to position, sell, scope and design Websense solutions.

item.title: Zscaler
item.description: Provided technical pre-sales support for partners and direct customers.
item.dc:creator: Richard Stocks

item.title: Check Point Software Technologies
item.description: Provided echnical pre-sales support for partners and direct customers, with a focus on the telecommunications sector.

item.description: Technical lead for post-sales activities across the APJ region.

item.title: Intel Solution Services
item.description: Worked with enterprise, government and defense customers to increase data centre capacity and resilience through adoption of virtualisation technologies.

item.title: Crown Limited
item.description: Led the infrastructure team in the design, build and support of the development, test and production environments to support the CrownGames online gaming environment.
